subtitle: paper 147
the interlude visit to jerusalem
jesus and the apostles arrived in
capernaum on wednesday march 17th
and spent two weeks at the bethesda
headquarters before they departed for
jerusalem
these two weeks the apostles taught the
people by the seaside
while jesus spent much time alone in the
hills about his father's business
during this period jesus accompanied by
james and john zebedee
made two secret trips to tiberias where
they met with the believers and
instructed them in the gospel kingdom
many of the household of herod believed
in jesus and attended these meetings
it was the influence of these believers
among herod's official family

these believers at tiberius had fully
explained to herod that

venture
